XXmspram_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXmspram_u:3: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate dakṣiṇe pārśve buddhagocare ratnavṛkṣe prabhāse vanaṣaṇḍe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ //
XXmspram_u:23_0: evaṃ pramukhair ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśatais tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān sabhikṣusaṃgho
XXmspram_u:23_1: māgadhena rājñājātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rcito
XXmspram_u:24: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūd abhrakūṭaṃ ca prādurbhūtam /
XXmspram_u:25: mahati cākālavātāśanir mahāmeghaś ca samutthito devo garjati guḍaguḍāyati vidyutaś ca niścaranti /
XXmspram_u:28: candrasūryau na prabhavato na tapato na virocato na ca prabhāsvarau bhavataḥ //
XXmspram_u:29: atha bhagavān adrākṣīd divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ tāni bhayāni prādurbhūtani /
XXmspram_u:30: (Mps_2) apy ekatyānāṃ vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāṃ yā grāmāntaḥ purīṣābhūtair adhiṣṭhitā abhisaṃsṛṣṭā /
XXmspram_u:31_1: bhūtair abhibhūtāḥ samantataś ca vaiśālījanapade yā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bhītās
XXmspram_u:31_2: trastāḥ saṃvignāḥ saṃdṛṣṭaromakūpajātā ūrdhvamukhāḥ prakrandanto buddhadharmasaṃghān namasyanti //
XXmspram_u:32: ye ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhaśāsane nābhipannās te cāpy ekatyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo brāhmaṇaṃ namasyanti /
XXmspram_u:33: kecit punaḥ śakraṃ kecil lokapālān namasyanti /
XXmspram_u:35: kathaṃ nāmaitad syād vayam evaṃrūpād upadravato bhayasthānāt parimucyema iti //
XXmspram_u:36_0: atha bhagavāṃs tathā rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram akāśīd yathā rūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena
XXmspram_u:36_1: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ svareṇa vijñāpya sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ prasādya
XXmspram_u:37_0: atha brahmā sahāpatir brahmakāyikāś ca devāḥ śakraś ca devānām indro devāś ca trayastriṃśāś
XXmspram_u:37_1: catvāraś ca mahārājānaś caturmahārājakāyikāś ca devā aṣṭāviṃśatiś ca mahāyakṣasenāpatayo
XXmspram_u:37_2: dvātriṃśac ca mahāyakṣanagnā hārītī ca saputrikā saparivārā atikrāntavarṇā atikrāntāyāṃ
XXmspram_u:37_3: rātrau kevalaṃ kalyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvataṃ svakena varṇānubhāvenodāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
XXmspram_u:38: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitā ekavāgekasvaraikapadena bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhituṣṭuvuḥ //
XXmspram_u:43: parvato vā suvarṇasya niṣkaṃ jambūnadasya vā //
XXmspram_u:44: candro vā vimale vyomni nakṣatrebhiḥ puraskṛtaḥ //
XXmspram_u:46: lokaḥ sadevako hy eṣa muniṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ /
XXmspram_u:50: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottamam /
XXmspram_u:52: atha bhagavān muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇībhavenādhivāsya caturo mahārājān āmantrayāmāsa //
XXmspram_u:53: naitaṃ te mahārājānaḥ pratirūpaṃ bhaved yad yuṣmat pariṣado 'smat pariṣadaṃ viheṭhayitavyaṃ manyate /
XXmspram_u:55: ito hi mānuṣe loke buddhotpādo dharmasvākhyātatā ca saṃghasupratipannatā ca /
XXmspram_u:56: idam asmin bījam avaropya buddhā bhagavanto loka utpadyante /
XXmspram_u:57: pratyekabuddhāś cārhantaḥ śrāvakāś cāsminn ime lokāḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropya sa daśato dvātriṃśatāṃ devanikāyānām anyatarānyatare devanikāye utpadyante /
XXmspram_u:60: teṣāṃ ca putrasahasraṃ bhavati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ mahānagnabalavegadhārināṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ saptaratnasamanvāgatānām /
XXmspram_u:61: tad yuṣmākam alpotsukavihāreṇa viharatām evaṃrūpāṇām asmin loke notpattir bhaviṣyati //
XXmspram_u:62_0: atha vaiśramaṇo mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:62_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:63_0: santi bhadanta bhagavann asmākam udārāṇi gṛhasthānabhavanāni nagarodyānavimānakūṭāgāraharmyaniryūhatoraṇagavākṣaśubharucitavividhavicitrapaṭṭadāmaghaṇṭācāmaramuktājālaparikṣiptāni (Mps_4)
XXmspram_u:64: dhūpaghaṭikāni dhūpitāni puṣpāvakīrṇāni yeṣu vayaṃ nārīśatasahasraparivṛtāḥ saṃpūrṇaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtā viharāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:65: teṣām asmākaṃ bhadanta bhagavan pramattānāṃ pramādavihāravihāriṇāṃ viharatāṃ pariṣadaḥ samantād daśadiśo 'nnapānabhojanāni mārgayanti /
XXmspram_u:66: prapalāyamānāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ tiryagjātagarbhānāṃ tiryagyonigatānām api ca prāṇinām ojo haranti viheṭhayanti vighnayanti mārayanti /
XXmspram_u:68: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavato 'ntike caturvarṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ purataḥ svakasvakānāṃ pariṣadāṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:71: āturasya ca hastena tasya mahārājasya nāmnā nānāgandhadhūpā dhūpayitavyāḥ /
XXmspram_u:72: puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ dhāraṇīṃ kṛtvā dīpāṃś cādīpya tatra caitye pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:73: madīyāyāḥ pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan yakṣagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:75: nidrā cāviśate tasya śūlo vāpy upajāyate //
XXmspram_u:77: rātrau praharṣam āyāti vepate stanate sadā //
XXmspram_u:78: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:92: sidhyantu me mantrapadāḥ svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca vaiśramaṇasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:93_0: atha dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:93_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno bhagavantam (Mps_5)
XXmspram_u:95: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan gandharvagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:97: alubdhaḥ satyavādi ca hasate kupyate punaḥ //
XXmspram_u:99: unmiṣati na cakṣuś ca śayate ca parāṅmukhaḥ //
XXmspram_u:100: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:115: mucyantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvagrahebhyo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:116_0: atha virūḍhako mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:116_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:117: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan kumbhāṇḍagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:118: balavatī tṛṣā bhonti vibhrāntaś cāpi prekṣate /
XXmspram_u:119: mukhaṃ lohitam ābhāti bhūmau svapiti kuñcitaḥ //
XXmspram_u:121: durgandho malinaś cāpi mṛśā sambhinnā bhāṣante //
XXmspram_u:122: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:142: śāmyantu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvagrahāḥ sarvabhayopadravā virūḍhakasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:144_0: atha virūpākṣo mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:144_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:145: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan nāgasuparṇīgrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:146: hikkate śvasate cāpi śītalaṃ gātram eva ca /
XXmspram_u:147: svidyate phenalālāsya svapate ca punaḥ punaḥ //
XXmspram_u:148: varṇavān bhavate śūro vepate dhāvate tathā /
XXmspram_u:149: punar nakhān vidarśayati mahīṃ viśati roditi //
XXmspram_u:150: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:168: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca virūpākṣasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:169: atha bhagavāṃs tāvad eva sarvāvatyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purataḥ siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
XXmspram_u:170: daśabalasamanvāgato 'haṃ caturvaiśāradyaviśāradaḥ pariṣady udāram ārṣabhaṃ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadāmi /
XXmspram_u:173: rakṣāyai sarvasatvānāṃ sarve vidyāṃ śṛṇātha me //
XXmspram_u:187: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca tathāgatasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:195: yasyāṃ trasanti bhūtāni śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:198: yo hy etan nābhimanyeta ṛṣivākyaṃ subhāṣitam //
XXmspram_u:202: heṣṭham ūrdhvaṃ caturdikṣu kṣiptvā ca varuṇodakam //
XXmspram_u:203: yadi kṣipraṃ na muñceyuḥ śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:205: kṣemaṃ ca tena lapsyanti yakṣadaṇḍena tarjitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:208: aḍakavatīṃ rājadhānīṃ na gacchanti kadā cana //
XXmspram_u:210: āsanaṃ ca na lapsyanti bhūtasaṃghāḥ samāgame //
XXmspram_u:215: tīkṣṇeṇa cāsya śastreṇa karṇau nāsāṃ ca cchetsyati /
XXmspram_u:218: mukhataḥ sravate cāsya pūyam uṣṇaṃ ca śoṇitam //
XXmspram_u:226: rājñāṃ samāgatānāṃ hi jvalatāṃ tejasā śriyā /
XXmspram_u:227: antarīkṣaṃ tadā śāśtā sarvajño hi samudgataḥ //
XXmspram_u:237: ito buddhā hi jāyante buddhāḥ pratyekajā api //
XXmspram_u:238: itaś ca śrāvakotpattir devāś cāpi samutsthitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:243: evam etan mahābrahmann evam etat mahāmune //
XXmspram_u:245: sumeruṃ kaṃpayitvā tu dhāraṇīṃ parivartya ca //
XXmspram_u:248: diśaś cādarśanā bhāgās teṣāṃ neṣyāma sarvadā /
XXmspram_u:249: ye praduṣṭā bhaviṣyanti na ca lokahitodyataḥ //
XXmspram_u:250: lokaḥ sadevako hy eṣa garhate bhūtakāraṇāt /
XXmspram_u:254: atikrāmanti ye vidyāṃ mantrān auṣadham eva vā //
XXmspram_u:257: teṣāṃ daṇḍaṃ praṇeṣyāmaḥ sūtraṃ brahmaṇā nirmitam /
XXmspram_u:259: buddhasya pādau vanditvā ālokya ca parasparam /
XXmspram_u:265: puṣpapūrṇāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā cūrṇaiś cāpi hiraṇmayaiḥ /
XXmspram_u:266: yaṣṭīr ābadhya hi gale sūtrapāśāṃs tathāpi ca //
XXmspram_u:269: sāhasrapramardanaṃ hy etet saṃśrautuṃ sūtram uttamam /
XXmspram_u:274: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni grahā gandharvajā mune //
XXmspram_u:277: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni grahāḥ kumbhāṇḍajā mune /
XXmspram_u:280: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni bhonti nāgagrahā mune /
XXmspram_u:284: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni bhonti yakṣagrahā mune /
XXmspram_u:285: digbhāge uttare cāpi bhūtasaṃghāḥ śṛṇontu me //
XXmspram_u:290: putro dvitīyas tasyaiva janako nāma viśrutaḥ /
XXmspram_u:293: putras tritīyas tasyaiva nāmnā cāsau mahāgrahaḥ //
XXmspram_u:304: niṣṭhuraṃ puruṣaṃ daṇḍaṃ sarvabuddhair hi bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:305: eṣa gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ sarve gautamam ādarāt //
XXmspram_u:313: rājakuleṣu dvāreṣu vimāneṣu ca ye sthitāḥ //
XXmspram_u:317: ūrdhvaṃ heṣṭhaṃ ca ye yakṣāś caturdikṣu vidikṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:321: kṛtvā ca vāditaṃ citraṃ gāndharvaṃ nāṭyam eva ca /
XXmspram_u:322: indraḥ somaś ca varuṇo bharadvājaḥ prajāpatiḥ //
XXmspram_u:325: prajāgurur yatīśaś ca devasūtaś ca mātaliḥ /
XXmspram_u:331: devā nāgāś ca gandharvā asurā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
XXmspram_u:332: traitīyakaś ca unmādās tathā cāturthako jvarāḥ //
XXmspram_u:333: ye ca lokaṃ viheṭhanti praduṣṭā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
XXmspram_u:336: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama //
XXmspram_u:338: dhāvanti puratas teṣāṃ bhūtā yakṣā mahābhayāḥ //
XXmspram_u:349: kāṇāḥ kubjās tu garuḍā vikṛtākṣā vijṛmbhakāḥ //
XXmspram_u:378: vātaṃ pittaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ kṣobhayanti caturdiśam //
XXmspram_u:391: prasannā guhyakāḥ sarve duṣṭānām ālaye sthitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:393: uṣṇair māṃsaiś ca rudhirair bhāntāṅgāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ /
XXmspram_u:406: muñcanti dāruṇaṃ śvāsaṃ saṃtāpenti imāḥ prajāḥ //
XXmspram_u:414: prekṣanti cāvatāraṃ hi ojo hiṃsanti kilbiṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:418: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama /
XXmspram_u:420: sumerau girirāje ca cakravāḍe tathaiva ca /
XXmspram_u:423: śrīparvatasya mūrdhasthāḥ śṛṅgā ye bhṛśam udgatāḥ //
XXmspram_u:424: yās tatra devatādhastā ṛṣayaś ca tathādhikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:428: vemacitrī rāhulaś ca prahlādaś ca samāgatāḥ /
XXmspram_u:431: sāgaraḥ supratiṣṭhaś ca nāgarājo manasvy api //
XXmspram_u:433: vakṣunando vajramatir gaṅgā sindhuś ca sāgaraḥ //
XXmspram_u:436: kanyās teṣāṃ mahābhāgā añjaliṃ saṃpragṛhya vai /
XXmspram_u:441: śūcīlomā ca madreṣu malleṣu ca yaśodharaḥ /
XXmspram_u:442: vibhīṣaṇaś ca pāñcāle lohitākṣaś ca aśvaje //
XXmspram_u:443: piṅgalaś ca avanteṣu kapilākṣaś ca vaidiśe /
XXmspram_u:444: kumbhodaraś ca matseṣu sūrateṣu ca dīrghilaḥ //
XXmspram_u:445: pramardanas tu gāndhāre sūryamitraś ca kambuṣu /
XXmspram_u:449: kumbhīraḥ sātyakiś cāpi pāñcikaś ca jinarṣabhaḥ /
XXmspram_u:452: yamaś ca yamadūtaś ca māraś cāpi sasainyakaḥ //
XXmspram_u:453: harir nāmnā tv asau yakṣo yakṣakoṭīparigrahaḥ /
XXmspram_u:454: hārītī ca sasainyā tu giridāri ca yakṣiṇī //
XXmspram_u:458: puṣpadantī viśālā ca kharakarṇā ca rākṣasī //
XXmspram_u:461: rākṣasī bhadradantā ca brahmilā viṣṇulā tathā /
XXmspram_u:462: yakṣo hālāhalaś caiva rākṣasaś ca vituṇḍakaḥ //
XXmspram_u:463: śūleṣu te gṛhītvātha gavāś ca mṛgamānuṣān /
XXmspram_u:464: bhakṣayantaś ca jīvanto dhāvantaś ca diśodiśaḥ //
XXmspram_u:481: asty antare tu nagare udyāne vanapuṣpite //
XXmspram_u:486: anubhomi śriyaṃ tv agryāṃ bhūtānāṃ tatra maṇḍale /
XXmspram_u:489: annapānais tu vikalā dāruṇās tv itarāḥ prajāḥ //
XXmspram_u:497: samantād yojanaṃ yāvat kūṭāgārās tu nirmitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:498: suvarnasya bhaved eko dvitīyo rūpyam eva ca /
XXmspram_u:499: vaiḍūryasya tṛtīyas tu caturthaḥ sphāṭikaḥ śuciḥ //
XXmspram_u:504: citrair ābharaṇair agraiś citrair veśair alaṃkṛtāḥ //
XXmspram_u:509: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva tathā dārakadārikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:512: sasyaṃ bījaṃ phalaṃ puṣpam oṣadhaṃ pānabhojanam //
XXmspram_u:513: harante mānuṣīṃ lakṣmīm uccānīcīṃ karonti ca /
XXmspram_u:514: ye kecid duṣkṛtā loke vairāḥ kalahavigrahāḥ //
XXmspram_u:515: dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ hataṃ bhinnaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhūtajaṃ smṛtam /
XXmspram_u:517: uttrāsenti ca satvānāṃ viprekṣanti dviṣanti ca /
XXmspram_u:518: darśenti pāpakān svapnān prasuptān pīḍayanti ca //
XXmspram_u:519: dvārasthāś cācchaṭāṃ kṛtvā prakrośanti grasanti ca /
XXmspram_u:527: sadā citrāṇi darśenti ālayeṣu patheṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:528: gṛhāṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca dvāre muñcanti te grahāḥ /
XXmspram_u:529: gṛhītvā jīvitaṃ kāyaṃ kupathe grāmayanti ca /
XXmspram_u:530: vicitrāṇi ca rūpāṇi vicitrāṇi svarāṇi ca //
XXmspram_u:532: rogān vicitrān darśenti vyādhīn vai kāyasaṃsthitān /

XXmspram_u:988: palaṣaṣṭhikayā sūtraṃ kartayitavyaṃ likhitvā cīrikāyāṃ mūrdhni mahācaityeṣu mahāvṛkṣeṣu mahādhvajeṣu cocchrāpayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:989: nānāpuṣpair nānāgandhaiś ca pakṣamātraṃ pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:992_1: apagatasaṃkārāḥ kṛtvā khadirabadarāgniṃ prajvālya puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ dharaṇīṃ kṛtvā dvāraśālaśobhanāṃ
XXmspram_u:992_2: nānāgandhapradhūpitāṃ kṛtvā sarvabījāni sarpiṣāṃ mrakṣayitvā caturdiśaṃ prakṣeptavyāni /
XXmspram_u:993: agnau ca prakṣeptavyāni nānāraṅgāni ca sūtrāṇi dvāre bandhanīyāni tiryagyonigatāni niṣkāsya punaḥ praveśayitavyāni /
XXmspram_u:998: samudgatemaṃ cevāpīṭhe vāvaropya brahmapratibimbaṃ vā śakrapratibimbaṃ vā caturmahārājapratibimbaṃ vā catasro mudrāḥ kṛtvā sthāpayitavyāḥ /
XXmspram_u:999: nānāpuṣpair nānādhūpair nānāgandhair brahmaśakracaturmahārājamaheśvarayakṣasenāpatir yakṣamahānagnā hārītī ca namnā trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:1000: teṣāṃ balenaiśvaryādhipatena ca svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca muñcantu sarvaglānāḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1008: hārītī ca tathā devī gṛhya paśyāṃ tathā śubham /
XXmspram_u:1011: sarvam upahāraṃ cāpi bhavatv amṛtam auṣadham //
XXmspram_u:1014: kanakāhvasya jñānena ṛddhyā vai kāśyapasya ca /
XXmspram_u:1017: imāṃ pāṇitale vidyāṃ tasmin kāle udāharet //
XXmspram_u:1027: nihatāḥ sarvarogāś ca svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvadā sarvabhayebhyaḥ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1029_0: sarvakākhordavetāḍasaṃprayukteṣu karmasu tena puruṣeṇa striyā vā 'horātro vapuṣṭena
XXmspram_u:1029_1: susnātena subhūṣitena puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ nānāgandhapradhūpitāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ kṛtvā khadiravadarāgniṃ
XXmspram_u:1030: nānāraṅgāni ca sūtrāṇi śastreṣu vā śūleṣu vā kunteṣu vā kāṇḍeṣu vā granthayitvā bandhanīyāni sarvamūlāni sarvapuṣpāṇi nānāgandhodakaṃ kṛtvā mahati kuṇḍe prakṣeptavyāni /
XXmspram_u:1032: tasya taṃ sūtrakam ābandhya kuṇḍe 'dhiṣṭhāpanīyaḥ śastreṇa taṃ sūtrakaṃ cchitvā agnau prakṣeptavyam /
XXmspram_u:1034: buddhāḥ pratyekabuddhāś ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye /
XXmspram_u:1056: imair mantrapadair mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakākhordavetāḍauṣadhimantraviṣayogāḥ sarvadevaiś ccheditāḥ parājitāḥ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1057: galagaṇḍavaisarpātisāronmādagaṇḍapiṭakabhagandaraviṣapītakāt parimocayitukāmena susnātena subhūṣitena bhadrapīṭhāsananiṣaṇṇena iyaṃ vidyā udāhartavyā /
XXmspram_u:1064: maitryā vai brahmaṇā caiva aiśvaryeṇa śatakratoḥ //
XXmspram_u:1067: vīryeṇa tejasā teṣāṃ viṣam astv aviṣaṃ sadā /
XXmspram_u:1081: hatā gaṇḍāḥ kilāsāś ca vaisarpāś ca vicarcikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1082: piṭṭakā lohaliṅgāś ca kacchūr bhavati saptamī //
XXmspram_u:1083: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1085: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1087: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke trayo viṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1089: viṣasya pṛthivī mātā viṣasya pṛthivī pitā /
XXmspram_u:1090: etena satyavākyena viṣāḥ sarve syur nirviṣāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1091: bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmantu viṣaṃ pūrṇapātre vā saṃkrāmantu viṣaṃ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1092: athātaḥ kalikalahavigrahavivādaparacakraśatrūṇy aparājayitukāmena pūrvaṃ mahācaitye pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:1094: buddhena nirjitā mārā dharmeṇa ca adharmatā /
XXmspram_u:1095: saṃghena nirjitā tīrthyā indreṇa asurā jitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1096: asurais tu jitaḥ somo vainateyena sāgaraḥ //
XXmspram_u:1098: agninā ca jitāḥ kāṣṭhā udakenāgniḥ parājitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1100: satyena devās tiṣṭhanti satyena pṛthivī sthitā /
XXmspram_u:1101: satyaṃ buddhaś ca dharmaś ca satyaṃ jayatu mā mṛṣāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1117: tato 'tha śāstā sarvajña imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata //
XXmspram_u:1119: vajrasya co nāma gṛhītvā sarvadā naivaṃ bhayaṃ bhonti na chambitatvam //
XXmspram_u:1120: ya eṣān aṣṭān mahādyutīnāṃ nāmāni kīrteya anugrahārtham /
XXmspram_u:1121: na tasya agnir na viṣaṃ na śastraṃ krameṇa kāye kṛta sapavitre //
XXmspram_u:1122: saced asau āghātane upasthite utkṛṣṭaśastre vadhake ca saṃmukham /
XXmspram_u:1123: anusmaranto avalokiteśvaraṃ te khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ prapateyuḥ śastrāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1124: saced udgṛhītaṃ pi bhaveta śastraṃ bhañjitvā pāṇiṃ dharaṇīṃ pateyuḥ /
XXmspram_u:1125: na tasya kāye nipateya kiṃcid anyatra karma pūrimena yat kṛtam //
XXmspram_u:1127: namo 'stu te buddha anantagocarā namo 'stu te satyaprakāśakā mune /
XXmspram_u:1128: satyaṃ pratiṣṭhāya prajāya mocase sarve ca kāmāḥ saphālā bhavantu //
XXmspram_u:1136: dharmāya ca viśiṣṭhāya saṃghāya ca gaṇottame //
XXmspram_u:1137: buddhasya pādau vanditvā brahmā vacanam abravīt /
XXmspram_u:1138: buddhāḥ pratyekabuddhāś ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye //
XXmspram_u:1139: ṛṣayo lokapālāś ca yāvanto devatāpi ca /
XXmspram_u:1142: śakyo na te 'pi ca draṣṭuṃ nāpi śakyāś caturdiśam //
XXmspram_u:1143: yāsāṃ putro na jāyante yāsāṃ garbho na tiṣṭhati /
XXmspram_u:1146: niṣpannā garbhayā ca strī jāyate na viśalyate //
XXmspram_u:1147: nāmāni teṣām ākhyāse lokanātha śṛṇohi me /
XXmspram_u:1149: mātṛkā jāmikaś caiva kāminī revatī tathā /
XXmspram_u:1157: apasmāragṛhītas tu pheṇaṃ lālāṃ ca muñcati /
XXmspram_u:1170: tatra rūpaṃ samākhyāsye yathā trāsyanti dārakān /
XXmspram_u:1182: tasya lekhaṃ ca mudrāṃ ca datvā dūtyena preṣayet /
XXmspram_u:1183: ugrān grantha samānehi tvaṃ tān pañcadaśān grahān //
XXmspram_u:1186: etāni tāni bhūtāni bījaṃ nāśenti prāṇinām /
XXmspram_u:1188: yasyā na jāyate putro jāto vā yasya gṛhyate /
XXmspram_u:1194: ardharātre sthite kāle mūṣṭiṃ sthitvā tu sarṣapān //
XXmspram_u:1195: brahmanirmitam ity āhur brahmaṇā ca prakaṃpitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1197: yo imām atikramed vidyāsūtraṃ brahmaṇā nirmitām /
XXmspram_u:1217: kṣipraṃ saṃtiṣṭhatāṃ garbhaḥ samyag vardhantu indriyā /
XXmspram_u:1218: garbhasthāḥ sukhino bhontu mā ca naśyantu jātakāḥ //
XXmspram_u:1221: eṣā rakṣā samākhyātā ciraṃ jīvantu dārakāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1222: tato 'tha śāstā sarvajña imāṃ gāthām udāharet //
XXmspram_u:1223: rakṣito bhavantu garbhaḥ sukhaṃ modantu dārakāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1243: yatredaṃ nagare sūtraṃ grāme vā yadi vā gṛhe /
XXmspram_u:1244: nātra bālā mariṣyanti yatra tiṣṭhet subhāṣitaṃ //
XXmspram_u:1246: namo bhagavate buddhāya namo brahmaṇe sidhyantu //
XXmspram_u:1247: mantrapadās tārayantu imāṃ vidyāṃ brahmā manyatu svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1248: atha vaiśramaṇo mahārāja ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalir (Msp 38)
XXmspram_u:1250: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta bhagavan śrāvaka idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtram udgṛhṇayād vārayed vācayed deśayet paryavāpnuyāt tena vā bahuśrutena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1252: aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca tv ete yakṣasyodāracaityapūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyā āvartayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:1253: tasyāṣṭamyāṃ catvāro rājapuruṣā mahārājānāṃ purataḥ samanvāharanti nāma codghoṣayanti /
XXmspram_u:1254: caturdaśyāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ purataḥ samanvāharanti nāma codghoṣayanti /
XXmspram_u:1255: pañcadaśyāṃ svayam eva catvāro mahārājānaḥ samanvāharanti nāma codghoṣayanti //
XXmspram_u:1256: sarvasatvahitānukaṃpīvatāyaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvako ya idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtram udgṛhṇati dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti /
XXmspram_u:1257: tasya ca bhadanta bhagavan vayaṃ catvāro mahārājānaś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1259: sarvasatvair gurukṛtaś ca mānitaś ca pūjitaś ca rājñāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1260: anyatīrthakaśravaṇabrāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ pūjyo bhaviṣyati mitrāmitramadhyagato 'pi satkṛto bhaviṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1261: te ca śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śucinā bhavitavyam /
XXmspram_u:1263: na kudeśalābhena na kumitrasaṃsargeṇa na kudeśavāsasaṃprayuktena bhavitavyam /
XXmspram_u:1264: yasya ca bhūtagrahagṛhītasya purata idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanī nāma sūtraṃ śrāvayiṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1265: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ svayam eva rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti /
XXmspram_u:1266: evaṃ maharddhikaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtraṃ yasyāpi gṛhe ekam api rātriṃ divaṃ vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1267: tasya saṃvatsaraṃ yāvad amanuṣyā avatāraṃ na lapsyanti /
XXmspram_u:1268: namasyanīyaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvabhūtagaṇasya yaḥ idaṃ mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtraṃ dhārayiṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1269: tasya kāṅkṣataś catvāro mahārājāno sukham upadarśayanti /
XXmspram_u:1271: tat kasya hetor ye kecil loke vidyā (Msp 39)
XXmspram_u:1275: gaṃbhīravipulo pramāṇāni dūrāvataraṇā asādhāraṇā iyaṃ dharmamudrā //
XXmspram_u:1282: paripelavaṃ rasaṃ vīrā sāmakaṃ tagaraṃ busā /
XXmspram_u:1284: priyaṃgu rocanā spṛkkā sarṣapāś ca manaḥśilāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1290: yo hi paśyati tat sthānaṃ bhūtebhyo na bhayaṃ tataḥ /
XXmspram_u:1291: sthānaṃ na tatra bhūtānāṃ nānyeṣām ahitaiṣiṇām //
XXmspram_u:1295: yatrāsau vrajate pakṣī diśaṃ cāpi digantaram //
XXmspram_u:1296: sthānaṃ na tatra bhūtānāṃ nānyeṣām ahitaiṣiṇām /
XXmspram_u:1298: samantād yojanaṃ tatra svasti śāntir bhaviṣyati /
XXmspram_u:1307: aputro labhate putram adhano labhate dhanam /
XXmspram_u:1309: tiryagyonigate caiva tat syād vṛkṣaphaleṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:1311: tatra mantrapadāny asti indrasya vacanaṃ yathā /
XXmspram_u:1328: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvadigvidigbhyaḥ svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1330: tato brahmā ca śakraś ca lokapālā maheśvaraḥ /
XXmspram_u:1334: sadevamānuṣe loke sadṛśas te na vidyate /
XXmspram_u:1340: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama /
XXmspram_u:1342: atha bhagavān sāyāhnakālasamaye pratisaṃlayanād utthāya bhikṣūn āmantrayāmāsa /
XXmspram_u:1343: udgṛhṇadhvaṃ bhikṣavo mahāsāhasrapramardanīśūtraṃ dhārayata vācayata paryavāpnuyāt /
XXmspram_u:1347: yaḥ kaścid bhikṣavo mama śravaka etena mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtreṇa śuṣkavṛkṣasyāpi paritrāṇaṃ badhnīyāt parigrahaṃ tasya patrapuṣpaphalāni jayeran /
XXmspram_u:1349: evam uktās te bhikṣavo bhagavantam etad avocat /
XXmspram_u:1355: piṇḍapātraṃ ca bhojanaṃ niśrāya pravrajyā vyākṛtā /
XXmspram_u:1357: idam eva bahutaraṃ yad idaṃ pañcāmiṣasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tatra vayaṃ bhagavan kathaṃ pratipadyāmaḥ //
XXmspram_u:1358: evam ukte bhagavān tān bhikṣūn etad avocat /
XXmspram_u:1359: tena hi bhikṣavo yo hy etat mahāsāhasrapramardanīsūtraṃ dhārayitavyam /
XXmspram_u:1361: tena hi piṇḍapātraṃ parigṛhītā āhāre pratikūlasaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:1372_0: ātmarakṣā aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca rājagotrāya kanyāya susnātāya subhūṣitāya
XXmspram_u:1372_1: ahorātro vapuṣṭāya pañcaśikṣāpadaparigṛhītayā lohitaṃ sūtraṃ caturguṇaṃ kārayitvā
XXmspram_u:1373: granthiṃ kṛtvā tat sūtraṃ navena śastreṇa cchitvā dagdhā ratnabhaṇḍo vā udakaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā puṣpair ācchādayitvā nānāgandhena dhūpayitvā iyaṃ vidyā āvartayitavyā /
XXmspram_u:1374: yāvat taj jātaṃ sūtraṃ bhājane prādurbhavati /
XXmspram_u:1387: idaṃ puṣpaṃ ca gandhaṃ ca pratigṛhṇantu mamāhutim /
XXmspram_u:1388: prīṇitā pūjitā bhūtvā ete śodhantu bhojanam //
XXmspram_u:1393: chinnaṃ dagdhaṃ yathā sūtraṃ tādṛśaṃ bhavate punaḥ /
XXmspram_u:1404: yena dagdhaṃ yathā sūtraṃ satyaṃ kurvantu tādṛśam //
XXmspram_u:1411: śikhinaṃ ca buddhaṃ sugataṃ ca viśvabhum /
XXmspram_u:1414: etena saptān narottamānāṃ puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca śarīrapūjāṃ kāyena vācā (Msp 43)
XXmspram_u:1415: manasā ca kṛtvā prasannacittaśaraṇaṃ hy upaimi /
XXmspram_u:1416: eteṣu buddheṣu maharddhikeṣu yā devatāḥ santi abhiprasannāḥ /
XXmspram_u:1417: tā devatā āttamanā udagrāḥ kurvanti śāntiṃ ca nityam /
XXmspram_u:1418: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:1419: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavo bodhisatvā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
